video_processing_alternative.content: Implement alternative video processing solution to replace removed django-video-encoding
video_processing_alternative.current_limitation: Video duration extraction is disabled, video files upload but duration is set to None
video_processing_alternative.proposed_solution: Use mutagen or moviepy library for video metadata extraction
implementation_approach: Research mutagen vs moviepy for video duration extraction
Implement video processing function using chosen library
Update document_upload view to use new video processing
Add error handling for unsupported formats
video_processing_alternative.user_impact: Restores video duration metadata extraction for uploaded video files

multiple_file_upload_ui.content: Improve multiple file upload user experience after Django 5.0 FileInput widget changes
multiple_file_upload_ui.discovered_during: Django 5.0 upgrade - FileInput multiple files incompatibility
multiple_file_upload_ui.current_limitation: UploadDocumentForm uses standard FileInput without multiple attribute
multiple_file_upload_ui.proposed_solution: Implement modern drag-and-drop multiple file upload interface
implementation_approach: Research modern file upload libraries (dropzone.js, filepond, etc.)
Implement drag-and-drop interface for document upload
Add file preview and progress indicators
Maintain compatibility with existing backend processing
Add file type validation on frontend
multiple_file_upload_ui.user_impact: Better user experience for uploading multiple files simultaneously
